Facing synchronization problems with Microsoft Dynamics 365 through a SaaS project management tool You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. The issue might be due to outdated dependencies in the integration. Despite trying to restart the application and refresh connections, the problem continues My name is Liu Wei.. I need help to resolve this and ensure a smooth integration.
